package.name: Translate_WebsiteTranslator
package.summary: Easily configure and install your Translate.com Website Translator script!
package.description:
Translate.com is one of the leaders in translation services. With over 90 language options available and a growing number of localization products for the web, connecting with your global users has never been easier.

This plugin makes it easy to set up and install your Website Translator code snippet into your Magento store. Translate.com's Website Translator allows you to localize your entire website in just a few clicks!
View our demo site here!

What's possible with Translate.com's Website Translator?

- Automatic free machine translations of your website text.
- Easy management of your website translations via your Translate.com portal.
- Order professional human translations of your website text.
- Customizable language selection widget to allow your visitor to see your site in their language of choice.
- Automatic replacement of images and background images based on your visitor's preferred language.
- Automatic replacement of HTML5 audio and video based on your visitor's preferred language.

Installation and use:

1. Install the extension through Magento Connect.
2. In your Admin Panel main menu, go to Translate.com > Website Translator.
3. Enter your valid key, choose your desired options and click save.
4. That's it! As pages are visited on your site, text will automatically be sent to our servers for translation. Changes may take up to an hour to reflect on your site.

Notes:

- Use of the Website Translator requires a valid key and qualifying subscription from Translate.com
- Translations of your website text and other settings can be managed through your account on Translate.com
- Full documentation for this plugin and the Website Translator can be found at Translate Support
